conbody.p: Oracle CDC Client origininclude nullsWhen the Oracle LogMiner performs full supplemental logging, the resulting data includes all columns in the table with null values where no changes occurred. When the Oracle CDC Client processes this data, by default, it ignores null values when generating records.

You can configure the origin to include the null values in the record. You might need to include the null values when the destination system has required fields. To include null values, enable the Include Nulls property on the Oracle CDC tab.
